sourcesContent:
import { CardContent } from '@material-ui/core'; import React from 'react' import { CustomCard, Text } from "./Materials"; const Information = () => { const description = `Welcome to AutoSend! To get started make sure you input an email subject, the list of recipients, and the message you want to send. Field Information: - Recipients represents the emails of the people you want to send to - Names represents the names of the people you want to send to - Positions represents the positions that the people applied for How to fill out fields - If you plan to bcc/cc more than one person, make sure to separate their emails by a comma (Example: jane.doe@gmail.com, testing@gmail.com) - Recipients, names, and position should also be separated by a comma if there are several people. Make sure you list them out in the same order (Example: Recipients: jane.doe@gmail.com, john@gmail.com Names: Jane, John Position: Cookie, Monster)` return (
Guide
{description}
) } export default Information
